summary: Adds parallax mapping to the roads and bridges around Skyrim. Compatible with SMIM, HD2K, SRO, and Sexy Towns&Villages.
descriptionHtml:
Project Parallax - Roads&Bridges\\

PROJECT PARALLAX HAS BEEN REMASTERED! PLEASE GET THE NEW VERSION HERE  -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40512//?

[youtube]2-PPQZnqT8s[/youtube]

READ THE DAMN DESCRIPTION!!!

For the best preview examples, see the video rather than the screenshots, its much easier to see the effect.


This mod requires ENB version .112 or later. This mod adds parallax mapping to most of roads in Skyrim. In doing so it adds a level of realism that a simple texture and normal map cannot, and it does it with little to no performance hit. This mod would not have been possible without the help of Boris Vorontsov at ENB developement. He supplied the shaders necessary to get parallax mapping to function correctly, please be sure to thank him for his hard work. 

This mod is compatible with HD2K, Skyrim Realistic Overhaul, and Sexy villages texture packs.

There is a version for SMIM users.

(-REQUIREMENTS-)
ENB version .112 or later


READ THE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS THOROUGHLY!!


Download ENB here - http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm


(-INSTALLATION-)
Just install the \"meshes\" and \"textures\" folders into your Skyrim/data folder and click \"yes\" when prompted.


(-COMPATIBLITIES&KNOWN ISSUES-)
This mod runs off of ENB .112 or later, if you don\'t have that than this mod will not work right.

(-CREDITS-)
Boris Vorontsov
And Osmodius(me)
author: Osmodius
